original: intros k a Hne Hsqr. apply (Z.quot_nonzero _ _ Hne) in Hsqr. apply Z.divide_div_mul_apply in Hsqr as [q Hq]. rewrite Hq. apply Z.divide_antisym. - apply (Z.gcd_divide_l (k * k) a) in Hne. apply (Z.quot_apply _ k Hne). - apply Z.divide_mul_cancel_l; auto. apply (is_sqr_mult k k) in Hsqr. apply (is_sqr_sqr k) in Hsqr. apply Hsqr.
